name: LaunchDarkly MCP
description: LaunchDarkly feature management: flags, targeting rules, metrics, experiments. 97% feature control.

features.feature_flags: Create and manage feature flags with complex targeting
features.gradual_rollouts: Deploy features gradually to specific user segments
features.experimentation: Run A/B tests and multivariate experiments
features.targeting: Advanced audience targeting based on user attributes
features.metrics: Track custom metrics for feature impact
